sfall1 Installation Instructions
================================

1. Extract the sfall1 archive to a temporary folder.

2. Copy all files from the extracted folder into your Fallout 1 game directory.

3. If prompted, overwrite existing files.

4. (Optional) Edit 'ddraw.ini' to customize settings as needed.

5. Launch Fallout 1 as usual. sfall1 will be loaded automatically.

Notes:
- Make sure Fallout 1 is not running during installation.
- For troubleshooting, refer to the documentation or community forums.
